hook.name: Hook (Pain Point)
hook.purpose: Start with the emotional/physical reality the reader faces
hook.example: הרגליים שלך מרגישות כבדות בסוף היום?

empathy.name: Empathy (Validating the Feeling)
empathy.purpose: Acknowledge their struggle with genuine understanding
empathy.example: אני יודעת בדיוק איך זה מרגיש...

science.name: The Science (Simple Explanation)
science.purpose: Explain the mechanism in accessible terms without overwhelming

protocol.name: The Protocol (Actionable Steps)
protocol.purpose: Provide clear, implementable steps they can take today

bridge.name: The Bridge (Call to Action)
bridge.purpose: Natural transition to relevant product recommendation or clinic consultation

qa.name: Q&A Section
qa.format: H3 for questions, paragraph for answers

headingStructure.h2: Main sections (Hook, Empathy, Science, Protocol, Bridge, Q&A)

internalLinks.purpose: Link to related articles within the blog
